items.name: Shock Hammer
items.description: our hero disarms teh enemy force for one turn every time.

minions.name: The Wolf
minions.description: once attacks a minion, this minion looses some 6 units of its Hp in the next turn.

minions.name: Goblin
minions.description: adds a one-unit power buff to all friendly minions.

minions.name: Bahman
minions.description: decreases the health of opponent's minions by 16 units, choosing the desired minion randomly.

minions.name: The Leopard
minions.description: once attacks a minion, this minion looses some 8 units of its Hp in the next turn.

minions.name: The Great Ghoul
minions.description: no special power.

minions.name: The Witch Master
minions.description: adds a power buff worth of 2 APs and a continuous holy buff to  friendly minions around it for one turn.

minions.name: Piraan
minions.description: can not be poisoned.

minions.name: Iraj
minions.description: no special power.

minions.name: Giiv
minions.description: does not take negatie impacts from other cards, be it a negative buff or getting hurt.

minions.name: Ashk Boos
minions.description: does not take damage from those of less AP.

spells.name: All Disarm
spells.description: disarms all of opponent's forces for one turn.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: reduces opponent's hero's HP by 8 units.

spells.name: Madness
spells.description: increases AP of a friendly force by 4 units for 4 turns, but also disarms.

heroSpell.description: damages all the forces of its row a total of 4 HPs.
